headline: FirstEnergy Transmission, LLC Announces Launch of Exchange Offer For its 4.750% Senior Notes Due 2033
summary: FirstEnergy Transmission, LLC ("FET" or the "Company"), a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) and a holding company of electric transmission companies operating in Ohio, Pennsylvania, West Virginia, Maryland and Virginia, today announced an offer to exchange up to $450 million aggregate principal amount of its outstanding 4.750% Senior Notes due 2033 (the "Outstanding Notes") for an equal amount of 4.750% Senior Notes due 2033 registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "
